General.Name: Litecoin Cash
General.Description: Litecoin Cash is an erc20 token, a form of digital currency secured by cryptography and issued through the Ethereum platform.

ICO.Description:
Litecoin Cash is an erc20 token, a form of digital currency secured by cryptography and issued through the Ethereum platform.

Litecoin Cash will be holding its ICO on March 1st, 2018. The ICO token supply represents 80% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 44,000,000 tokens available, for 0.0005 ETH each at the offering. The ICO funding cap is 25,000 ETH and is expected to end on July 1st, 2018 or when the funding cap is reached.

Token Reserve Split (20%):

  • 15% Founders and team;
  • 5% Bounty for big investors;
